entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to 700 metres near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
